# CHANGELOG

## v4.3.2
* Fix: service metrics is no longer published after scope migration, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3170

## v4.3.1
* Platform version keeper: Upgrading module dependencies

## v4.3.0
* Fixed: Service client metrics name is changed from `rest` to `NODEJS_SERVICE_CLIENT` to onboard in UMP.
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2872

## v4.2.0
* Module upgrades

## v4.1.2
* Made validate-internals-ebay as soft dependency in case anyone would really use metrics, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2612

## v4.1.0
* Upgraded metrics to fast-stats
* Added 99 percentile for totalTime, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1218

## v4.0.1
* Removed obsolete dependencies (instrument-inc, instrument-ebay, servicecore)

## v4.0.0
* Remove peer and unwanted dependencies and upgrade dependencies

## v0.1.3
* Removed dependency on commons-ebay to break circular dependency issue.
